title: Acid-base titration curve - concentration of acid

content.question: In addition to the information provided in the titration curve, what other value is needed to determine the concentration of the acid used in the titration?

choices.label: The molar mass of the acid
The initial temperature of the acid

skill.text: 5.A: Identify quantities needed to solve a problem from given information (e.g., text, mathematical expressions, graphs, or tables).
